name: Castle by Candlelight
description:
You are on a tour of a castle, when it closes. You must now escape, but it will not be a simple journey.

Only one person has ever escaped the castle.

This adventure will take you through the ages.

Can you escape the dungeon. Remember to stay in the light, there are noises in the darkness.

This is my first attempt at releasing a game, let a lone VR, hopefully you will enjoy this short taste of adventure
